com::xuggle::xuggler::IContainerParameters

com::xuggle::xuggler::IContainerParameters Class Reference

#include <IContainerParameters.h>

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Parameters that can be set on a IContainer before opening.

Normally this class can be ignored, but for some container formats, such as webcams, you need to specify additional meta-data information for the container. Examples include the TimeBase (e.g. frame rate), and video width and height.

See also:
IContainer::setParameters(IContainerParameters)

Definition at line 49 of file IContainerParameters.h.

virtual const char* com::xuggle::xuggler::IContainerParameters::getTVStandard (  )  [pure virtual]

Get the TV Standard.

For some container formats representing television tuners, this is the tv standard they will get data as (e.g. NTSC, PAL, SECAM).

Returns:
the TV standard
